author: asianlego
title: Smooth handling and great playability.
review: This is one of Technic's finest vehicles that come in cheap and doesnt rip the wallet you bring to school in half. The one in the picture above is the Sport Bike and there is an alternate model which I liked better. The alternate model is a Roadster bike and it looks very sleek, if not blocky. I recommend this set if you like Technic vehicles but have no money to spend on the newer bank-busting models.
